TopicTitle: unexpected and continuous game crashes while I try to orbit Eeloo.

Articles.Content:
This is the second time I do the same mission landing Eeloo with 2 different vessels.
And when I'm taking off from Eeloo surface, the game always crashes without reason.

I don't know how to start to provide more informations as possible, so I start loading the game,
load the savefile, try to launch as usual and as soon the game crashes, I copy both the log files down here:

Seen from map view: https://www.dropbox.com/s/6lpsl4arar35ptb/seen from map view.mkv?dl=0

Case 1 - Using GT:
it always crashes around 5200m after the Pe is > 0.: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2phtizr4vafkkhz/crash issue GT.mkv?dl=0
log files: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dyvjoujwu4wo2ne/AAD6PcsYNN6ZEN4CSnYdUTgYa?dl=0

Case 2 - Manual Launch:
it always crashes just before complete the circularization: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rlxz4ak11t1s6pg/crash issue manual launch.mkv?dl=0
log files: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/koxtj4k59z0iznn/AADFb6YumtbJ7-s_vEMMewCRa?dl=0

Case 3 - Using GT with different input:
it crashes few seconds after Pe > 0 like the 1st case but at different altitude: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vbmeezc3sj7rj95/crash issue GT 100ms.mkv?dl=0
log files: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/mb6gefg2b4qtr05/AAAYNmMIY5XFMKyUqkmiL9h2a?dl=0


Very rarely the launch is completed without crashing:




And sometime this string appear in the top center for a second.




edit: restarted the notebook, launch with no problems:
no crash log: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/1lbka3j0pmtroxp/AADvOcP4uzfYcShe0gL1zfSna?dl=0

I continue to play returning home but I will keep these saves when I'm landed on Eeloo in case of someone help me find the problem.

 

Edited August 30, 2021 by antipro
